page.title: 09SCHOOLS IN OADBY
page.content: Most schools are modern, and have some mobile classrooms. They serve dinners and have at least one computer. Maths, English, French, Drama, Music, His- tory, Geography, Science, Physical Education, Art, Craft and Cookery are taught in all the schools. 0ur{primary {school}is open plan.There are 260 children, starting at the age of 4. There is a special unit for those who are behind with learning. We have playgrounds, a field, and a small swimming pool.At ten, children move to the{high school,}which has roughly 880 pupils. They wear uniform. There are special rooms for science, metal- and wood-work, drama, music, and gym. The {college}takes 1200 students from 14-18. Students choose some of the subjects they study, which include computing, economics, physics, chemistry, biology, and technology.
